message: Let's be reasonable, I'm giving you a good chunk.
I'm willing to split the money evenly after a 200,000$ adjustment in my favor.  Let's be fair.
I'm giving you a bit more than before, but don't think I'll go much lower.
I'm increasing my offer again.  I know we're both losing money with each round, so let's try to end this quickly.  This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll give you one last chance to accept a reasonable split.
